name: Barauni Satsang Vihar
history:
Inaugurated by Acharyadev Sree Sree Dada on 20th November,2011.
Visit of Thakur Family-
Param pujyapada Sree Sree Borda on 2nd January,1979.
After that few members of Thakur Family also Visited the place.
address:
Vill/City .-Rajwara Bhitha,P.O.- Garhara, P.S.- Barauni , 
Dist.- BEGUSARAI ,  
PIN- 851126 ,  Bihar , India
near: Barauni Railway Station, Barauni Bus Stand, Tatra Airport
details:
Sree Sree Thakur Mandir,
Sree Sree Baorma Mandir,
Sree Sree Barda Mandir,
Acharya Bhawan (4 rooms),
Nat Mandap,
Guest House (3 rooms)
